metadata.name: Ametrine Firestone
metadata.description: Nodestones are the ultimate utility tokens used through the nifty.io ecosystem and the key item used by the Knights of the Ledger and Ex Machina. Nodestones assign a role within 1 of 5 Realms that focus on the development of NFTs and web3 properties. They continue as a whitelist minting pass for all future projects built by nifty.io
